div.p: … to be answerable for all that is required. This deed of surety, written in a single copy, is binding, and in reply to the formal question I assented. (hand 2) ‘I, Victor, zygostates, son of blessed …, agree to the surety …
… of the Oxyrhynchite nome … of the city of the Oxyrhynchites Translation: N. Gonis, P.Harr. 3 306
